tactic: apply filterdiff_locally with (F := locally x) (x := x).
exceptions.exn: No such bound variable F (possible names are: f0, x0 and l).

original: intros Loc Fx Df. apply filterdiff_locally with (F := locally x) (x := x). - apply ex_filterdiff_locally with (f := f). exists l. apply Df. - split. + destruct Df as [Hl _]. apply Hl. + intros x0 Filter. assert (Hfg : f x0 = g x0). { apply (Loc x0). auto. } rewrite <- Hfg. destruct Df as [_ Df0]. specialize (Df0 x0 Filter). apply Df0.
